title: CAREER IMPACT
content: Graduates of the D3 Road Transportation Management program have promising career opportunities in the road transportation sector. They can work in government agencies such as transportation departments, logistics companies, public transportation operators, or as transportation consultants. With skills in operational management, data analysis, and transportation planning, graduates play a crucial role in improving the efficiency and safety of road transportation systems. Their competencies open pathways to higher career levels in both public and private sectors, while also contributing significantly to the development of sustainable road transportation.
